title: Sans Serif from J. Crew Liquor Store
content:
Hi,

I shot a pic of the shopping bag for J. Crew Liquor Store, the new menswear shop. Please help ID the Sans Serif type.

Thanks,

Eleanor

comments.content: Does anyone know what “Liquor” is set in?
